headline: Fidelity National Information Services (FIS): Assessing Valuation Disconnect as Shares Slide 10% Over Three Months
summary: Fidelity National Information Services (FIS) has seen its stock move in recent weeks, drawing attention from investors assessing the company’s current value and long-term growth prospects. Shares are down around 10% over the past 3 months. See our latest analysis for Fidelity National Information Services. After a tough year that has seen Fidelity National Information Services’s 1-year total shareholder return fall by 24.0%, momentum remains weak even as the company seeks to reassure...
